product_name: ASICS GEL-Enthrall Cross-Training Shoes - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The sleek and sporty women's ASICS GEL-Enthrall Cross-Training Shoes are constructed for great stability and support on your long runs and instense workouts. Shoes offer a women-specific fit and breathable synthetic leather and mesh uppers for excellent comfort. The lightweight arch support of the ASICS Trusstic System and comfort of rearfoot GEL cushioning help you run longer and farther. ASICS GEL-Enthrall Cross-Training Shoes have high-abrasion rubber placed in critical areas of the outsoles for exceptional durability. Closeout.
short_description: The sleek and sporty women's ASICS GEL-Enthrall Cross-Training Shoes are constructed for great stability and support on your long runs and instense workouts.
